column4: can someone tell me how to share a file located on a external hdd.
is it possible to use samba to share files stores on an external hdd
how do I share a folder located on external hdd. I have mounted the hdd and installe ntfs-3g; can read and write to hdd but cannot access shares?
anyone using samba to share files on network?
i do ;)
do you have an external hdd that you use to share files?
nope but i can share my usb flash disk.
did you look at the pastebin. /media/External
did u mounted the hd succesfully?
yeah, it's mounted properly i guess. I can read ans write to it just can share files located on it
I can't share files located on the external
what have u tried to shared it?
could you please take a look here http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14375/
it seems that i can't help u, can u browse the external hdd throug the networking in the box itself (not from other pc)?
yes, I can read and write to it from the connected pc
what is the system of another pc?
all three pc's are running Ubuntu
oh i see, did u have try to mount it over network uusing smbfs?
I don't think so, did you find something in my mount output?
no i can't anything it seems that u have try many corrected way, but i suggest u to mounted the shared drive over network using smbfs
unsure how to do that, do you have a link
try read this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SettingUpSamba at the mounting samba shares section
i appreciate it, I'll take a look and see what I can't break :)
how is everything?
